description:
Popular Pyramid Solitaire card game optimized for Palm Pre/Palm Pixi/HP Veer/HP Pre3 smartphones.  Enjoy animation and easy control! 

FEATURES: 
- Large and eye-friendly card set, optimized for fingers and long play 
- Intuitive cards dragging system 
- Optional timed game, scoring and statistics 
- Unlimited undo 

RULES: Pair up all the cards whose ranks add to 13 (K, A+Q ,J+2, 10+3, etc.) Only uncovered cards, top waste or top stack available for play. Max 2 redeals. To discard a pair, drag one card over another, Details included in the HELP section
Also Klondike solitaire, Freecell solitaire, Pyramid solitaire, Spider solitaire are available.
versionNote:
- HP Pre3 support
- some small bugfixes
